name: The Devil's in the Details (Matthew)
description:
Move around the board and land on tiles to claim Souls. After everyone has moved, everyone moves to a minigame where players compete for Souls and advantages. Once you reach the end of the board, make a bid on “The Contract” to earn points, but also carry the burden of The Devil in the Details.

Current (Rough) Timeline:
 - Art Build - Nov 28
 - Full Build - Dec 1
